desc: Veronica Tharmalingam™ is a brand of luxury evening handbags celebrating an unconventional lineage of women, spawned by a fierce Indian Warrior Queen.Bold, vibrant and elegant,these unique bags are an invitation for women to find their inner queen, and to dare express it with class, authenticity, confidence and style

layout.text:
Inspired by the underwater life of coral
reefs and sunsets in the Maldives.
